lines.text: [About Don Toland, an unscrupulous horse owner]
He's the biggest unhung crook south of the border.
[Charley returns after a six month trip]
Hello, Charley. Your dinner is on the table.
How come you always know when I'm coming home?
Maybe I hear it on the wind.
[Charley Eagle is dying of a heart attack]
For the first time I wish I were a white woman.
[On the presentation stand, after Black Gold won the Kentucky Derby]
I want to thank everyone who is here and one who is not. Chi-hua-hua!
